alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:20AM CDT until May 09 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Tipton County in west Tennessee... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 119 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tyronza, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Lepanto, Wilson, Tyronza, Joiner, Dyess, Gilmore, Bassett, Marie, Turrell, Birdsong, Whitton, Dimple, Deckerville, Evadale, Driver, Menesha, Golden Lake, Dub and Chelford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
